title: Urgot is the new King
body: Lets be honest, Urgot was completely irrelevant and awful champion. Then they use him in LCS for 1 game and BOOM! Solo Queue is full of no skill, first time Urgot user who think they can clutch every game. It makes me very sad.

replies.body: Sheep meta, sounds about right.
I am a sheep and I am offended.
I am a offended and I am sheep.
I sexually identify as sheepkin, so I sympathize with your pain.
go back to isis
Get back in the Flockers death machine >.>

> [{quoted}](name=Sirsir94,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=tANMJvQg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-23T01:17:04.875+0000)
>
> Sheep meta, sounds about right.

Sheep are pretty amazing, haven't you played Catherine?

Does that mean I get plus points for playing him before he was cool?
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/213849009?champion=6

+2 Visionary points
-3 Hipster points.

-1 total, sorry.

Hey,it's only -1.It's close to 0 which is close to 1.I say close enough.

Plus,I already have -100 points.1 more negative won't mean a thing.
{{champion:63}} Heh.  {{summoner:14}}'d.
Lol yeah i can imagine that. He was never really bad to begin with. People just refused to play him because "fuck that UP, ugly as sin champ"
Except the people who got gifted battlecast. Once they were able to play the game without the urge to vomit, they suddenly realized his potential.

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=tANMJvQg,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-23T08:36:55.481+0000)
>
> **Urg**~~e to v~~**o**~~mi~~**t**

cough cough

Have you ever seen his death animation in game? Green goo comes out of him when he dies, it was disgusting and when me and my friend figured that out in a 1v1 we both almost puked. So now when i play Urgot i must not pay attention to it if i happen to die.
He was bad due to mana constraints and 400 auto range. They have made multiple mana cost deductions and a huge buff to his shield somewhat recently.
Exactly.
Your FEK pic {{item:3070}}
Exactly. RIP VEIGAR 2007-2015
his rank 1 ulti range is still garbage, so I'm keeping him on the shelf

Before this season started I mained Ezreal, Urgot and Poppy.  All three were rage-worthy shit tier useless champions in most peoples eyes.

Now Ezreal is common in LCS, and Urgot and Poppy have seen pro play.  

Next up is Riot nerfing them for getting popular.  Grump.
I'll have you know I played Urgot *before* it was cool. I just select my Battlecast skin, and show them what an Obese Robot Tick can really do.

He's always been good, it was just that he was forgotten and not many could do him well.  I've carried many an ARAM with him.  I though it ridiculous that so many people tried to give him (or Morde) away in Nemesis as well.

As someone who went something like 9/6, 10/1, 15/1, and 12/2 in Nemesis with the Urgod, I agree. I just wish that I hadn't been stuck on the platform because the gate never dropped for me in that first game. Had to disconnect/reconnect and lost valuable time.

I remember using Urgot often last season in top.

Every time I picked him in champion select it was always; "Urgot top gg" "WTF??? I'M ADC NOT YOU" "Someone dodge pls" "why troll?" and a bunch of shit around those lines.

Even if I won my lane and the match people would still call me a troll, and when I lost my lane the whole game would often get blamed on me.

Then he gets picked ONCE in the professional scene and now he's getting banned and picked. He's "acceptable" now even though the buff to his W is not even that great (it's weaker in lane phase)

Seriously LoL players flock to LCS picks like flies to shit.
Actually stronger in lane, by about 20 at level 1
Except he was strong.

> [{quoted}](name=King Denver,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=tANMJvQg,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-23T01:15:38.202+0000)
>
> Lets be honest, Urgot was completely irrelevant and awful champion. Then they use him in LCS for 1 game and BOOM! Solo Queue is full of no skill, first time Urgot user who think they can clutch every game. It makes me very sad.

I am saddened by this as well brother, or sister. I don't like it when people play my obscure champs badly. On the other hand, perhaps his win rate will get even lower.
Praise urgot our lord and savior

*Clears throat*

{{champion:6}} Urgod.

Fixed that for you.
you forgot to mention that urgot recieved a massive buff to his shield scaling.

The only reason he was bad before was him looking hideous, his attack range, and his mana costs. But with nerfs(buffs?) to his mana costs, and a better shield, he is a lot better now. The lowered attack range sucks, but his basic attacks can reduce their movement speed and the damage they deal, so I believe it is a good trade off. He has amazing single target harass and, quite literally, shreds people up top.

My friend played urgot alot in ranked, the team rages so hard when he does, with the "he's worthless, he's shitty, why would you play URGOT) then he went 5/0 first 5 minutes, they stopped very quickly, and this was before everyone had a change of heart and started "urgod"...

FFS! I always played URgot. UGH. Battlecast urgot all day ere day u lil kids and ur "oh he's cool now, lets go play him". Damn drones and ur cattle mentality! I did everything before nay LCS player even thought of it so you're all just copying me.

I've been plaxing LoL for almost a year now and I saw (as far as I can remember) Urgot once (!) in a normal game and played him on ARAM when he was free. I agree that he's not an easy champ but he's really not picked as often as you state.. at least on EUW servers.

I like the graphic anyway. :D
haha
Next time someone tells me a champion is UP, Im just going to say "Urgot"
I literally haven't seen anything like that.

I bought Urgot after going like 11/2 as him in ARAM. I was so happy about the shield buff because it gave me a reason to play him more often. And since my mmr is so low right now from trolls, I carry every game as him.
I bought him three days ago. I hate everything.

I used to play a shit ton of urgot and I was good at him too, one game my team only had five kills and I had 4. With an assist. Most of hte time i play urgot though my teammates try to screw me over and I get a ton of reports. As in: "report this gay ass noob he picked urgot". {{champion:6}} {{item:3070}}
